value.title: Meta’s Andrew Bosworth on moving Facebook to the metaverse
value.excerpt: Facebook announced a major corporate rebrand by changing its company name to Meta. As CEO Mark Zuckerberg told The Verge, the new name is meant to solidify the social media giant’s long-term bet on building the metaverse.

value.title: Using conversational AI to support employees’ psychological needs
value.excerpt: Healthcare workers put on a brave face each day to serve those who are suffering, and in doing so they often put aside their personal self-care. value.title: Facebook battles the challenges of tactile sensing
value.excerpt: Facebook detailed its efforts to overcome challenges in tactile sensing, which include developing new sensors and modeling techniques.

value.title: Intel Habana AI Accelerator Becomes Available On Amazon EC2
value.excerpt: The Amazon EC2 DL1 instance type delivers up to 8 Gaudi accelerators with 32 GB of high bandwidth memory (HBM) per accelerator with 400 Gbps of networking throughput and 4 TB of local NVMe storage.

value.excerpt: This is the fifth blog in the Advancing AI in the Transportation Industry, focused on drones and references innovations by Amazon.

value.title: Tech Time: Delta Air Lines launches new facial recognition software
value.excerpt: To streamline the check-in process at the airport, Delta Air Lines is introducing new facial recognition technology to airport security.

value.title: Intuit Accelerator Combines Fintech For Good With AI
value.excerpt: Fintech for good startup Bankuish is one of seven early-stage companies in the Intuit Prosperity Accelerator: AI. The five-month program is for fledgling fintech companies that target consumers and small businesses in North America and want to use AI to build better platforms.

value.title: The D-Link Eagle Pro AI Router Brings Affordable WiFi 6 For All
value.excerpt: D-Link is the latest brand to join the affordable WiFi 6 party with the new R15 Eagle Pro AI AX1500 smart router. This surprisingly small and lightweight router combines Wi-Fi 6 technology and artificial intelligence in a router that offers strong wireless coverage and higher speeds,

value.title: Neuron Bursts Can Mimic a Famous AI Learning Strategy
value.excerpt: A new model of learning centers on blasts of neural activity that act as teaching signals—approximating an algorithm called backpropagation.

value.title: Use Of Artificial Intelligence (AI) In Content Marketing Was Huge In 2022, Says Scalenut Founder
value.excerpt: Scalenut is a next-gen AI-powered platform for content research and content creation. From short-form to long-form, its AI writes everything.

value.title: Ai Weiwei Traces a Century of Making Authorities Squirm
value.excerpt: A new memoir by world-famous artist-provocateur Ai Weiwei, “1000 Years of Joys and Sorrows,” traces a century of his family’s ups and downs with authorities; it’s being published in more than 20 countries—though not China.

value.title: Activ Surgical harnesses AI and machine learning to collaborate with surgeons
value.excerpt: With machine learning, Activ Surgical's autonomous model can annotate a one-hour surgical video 20,000 times faster than humans can.

value.title: From a hidden Picasso nude to an unfinished Beethoven, AI uncovers lost art — and new challenges
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence is being used to bring lost works from the likes of Picasso and Beethoven back to life, but not everyone is celebrating the achievement.

value.title: AT&T and H2O collab on feature store for AI developers
value.excerpt: Telecom giant AT&T and AI cloud firm H2O have jointly launched an AI feature store to help organizations accelerate AI development.

value.title: Samsung's Jet Bot AI+ robot vacuum is a must-have for pet owners
value.excerpt: The Samsung JetBot AI+ looks like the robot vacuum of the future, and has some ultramodern tech under the hood. Credit: leah stodart / mashable Despite their overall hands-off capabilities, most robot vacuums require some sort of pre-cleaning to avoid eaten phone chargers or socks.
